text: (O visvasulara!) Sandesaharuni pilupunu miru, milo okari nokaru pilucukune pilupuga bhavincakandi. Milo okari catuna okaru dakkuntu mellaga jaripoye varini gurinci allah ku baga telusu. Daivapravakta ajnanu ullanghince varu, tamu edaina apadalo cikkuku potaremonani leda badhakaramaina siksaku guri ceyabadataremonani bhayapadali
